    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulator

        Simulator(java.util.LinkedList<Player> players,
         int boardWidth,
         int boardHeight)
        A constructor for a new simulator.

        pre: the linkedlist of players is non-empty, and boardwidth and height are not 0
        post: a new simulator has been created with the given inputs

        Parameters:
        players: - a linkedlist of players which will be playing the game
        boardWidth: - the width that the board of the game will be
        boardHeight: - the height that the board of the game will be

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public int getCurrentPlayer()
        A getter for the current player
        Returns:
        the id of the current player

      • getWinner

        public java.lang.Integer getWinner()
        A getter for the winner of the game
        Returns:
        the id of the winning player, or null if no win has been made

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()
        A getter for the board this simulator is based on
        Returns:
        the board in it's current state

      • gameUpdate

        public void gameUpdate()
        This updates the game by one move. The outcome of that move is also dealt with, and simulator is left in a state which allows the next move to be made by a different player

        pre: the game is valid
        post: game has been updated by one move, a move has been made and whether that move has generated a win or draw has been dealt with

      • gamestart

             int boardWidth,
             int boardHeight)

        A function that will provide the human player with a hint for the next move.
